Blood 9

Forces of Darkness

Summon Units:#88 Fiend of Darkness x 14+
The caster summons and binds several Fiends of Darkness. Fiends of Darkness are coal-black demons summoned from the Abyss with human sacrifices. They fight with venomous claws and have bat-like wings. Fiends of Darkness are stealthy and able to hide in the night.
